p: CDs are widely used in pharmaceuticals, drug delivery systems, cosmetics, and the food and chemical industries. They can be found in commercially available medications, including tablets, eye drops, and ointments [ 3, 4, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12]. Their successful use in inclusion complexes with bioactive compounds has led to extensive investigations in several different application areas to try to overcome the limitations of certain substances ( Figure 1B) [ 1, 2, 5, 13, 14].
